job.title: Software Engineer - Front End (React)
job.description: stronguRolebrbrustrongThe Digital Experience team at Tesla is at the forefront of building a consistent global customer experience across all digital touchpoints  web native apps and incar infotainment systems This team is building the next generation products and supporting infrastructure which allows our customers living in 60 countries to understand interact and purchase our amazing vehicles and energy productsbrbrTesla is seeking a FrontEnd Software Engineer to join our team and help build the next generation of web solutions for our service partners and customers as it relates to the ownership experience You will be challenged to turn apps around quickly but thoughtfully balancing speed to market with longevity and scalability all in the name of extraordinary customer experiencesbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulli Build awesome web experiences using Reactjslili Plan and accommodate all mediums screen sizes and device typeslili Build in flexibility and customization from the startlili Internalize the user and promote good usability and accessibility in every experiencelili Be nimble and react quickly to changing business conditionslili Work with product managers content producers QA engineers and release engineers to own your solution from development to productionbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulli 1 years building web andor mobile experiences with evidence of exceptional abilitylili Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or related field or equivalent experience or other evidence of exceptional abilitylili Solid understanding of fundamental web technologies such as HTTP REST AJAX and JSONlili Strong proficiency in JavaScript  ES6 including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object modellili Thorough understanding of Reactjs and its core principleslili Unit Testing with JestEnzymelili Experience with Reduxlili Experience with common frontend development tools such as Babel Webpack NPM etclili Experience working with RESTful APIslili Experience with Nodejs and Expresslili Excellent mastery of web standards crossbrowser compatibility accessibility and SEOlili Strong CSS skills w experience building responsive applications across a variety of browsers and devices using modern CSS3 techniqueslili Ability to identify tasks which require automation and automate themlili Expert knowledge of maintaining and debugging live software systemsliul
